trans-unit.source: Update the extension list on a regular basis. Once a day is a good interval.
trans-unit.target: Update the extension list on a regular basis. Once a day is a good interval.

trans-unit.source:
Manages TYPO3 extensions from a central repository. TYPO3 extensions include plugins, modules, class extensions, configuration code, etc.
Access for 'admin' users only!
trans-unit.target:
Manages TYPO3 extensions from a central repository. TYPO3 extensions include plugins, modules, class extensions, configuration code, etc.
Access for 'admin' users only!

trans-unit.source: System extension (typo3/sysext/) - Always distributed with the TYPO3 source code (static).
trans-unit.target: System extension (typo3/sysext/) - Always distributed with the TYPO3 source code (static).

trans-unit.source: Global extension (typo3/ext/) - Available for shared source on server (dynamic).
trans-unit.target: Global extension (typo3/ext/) - Available for shared source on server (dynamic).

trans-unit.source: Local extension (typo3conf/ext/) - Local for this TYPO3 installation only (dynamic).
trans-unit.target: Local extension (typo3conf/ext/) - Local for this TYPO3 installation only (dynamic).

trans-unit.source: When you interact with the online repository, server information may be sent and stored in the repository for statistics.
trans-unit.target: When you interact with the online repository, server information may be sent and stored in the repository for statistics.

trans-unit.source: Did you find a security problem?
trans-unit.target: Did you find a security problem?

trans-unit.source: Please be aware that extensions are third-party software. Installing an extension is a security risk, as the high level of quality and security in the TYPO3 Core can not be assured in these extensions.
trans-unit.target: Please be aware that extensions are third-party software. Installing an extension is a security risk, as the high level of quality and security in the TYPO3 Core can not be assured in these extensions.

trans-unit.source: If you think you have found a security issue in TYPO3 or an extension, please contact the %sTYPO3 security team%s! Thank you!
trans-unit.target: If you think you have found a security issue in TYPO3 or an extension, please contact the %sTYPO3 security team%s! Thank you!

trans-unit.source: Update extension from version {0} to version {1}
trans-unit.target: Update extension from version {0} to version {1}

trans-unit.source: If you want to use an extension in TYPO3, you should simply click the "plus" button %s .
trans-unit.target: If you want to use an extension in TYPO3, you should simply click the "plus" button %s .

trans-unit.source: Installed extensions can also be removed again - just click the remove button %s .
trans-unit.target: Installed extensions can also be removed again - just click the remove button %s .

trans-unit.target: Update the extension in '%s' from online repository to server

trans-unit.target: The extension is excluded from updates! You can change this in the appropriate ext_emconf.php file.

trans-unit.source: For the selected languages the Extension Manager tries to download and install translation files if available, whenever an extension is installed. (This replaces the csh_* extensions that were used to install core translations before TYPO3 version 4!)
trans-unit.target: For the selected languages the Extension Manager tries to download and install translation files if available, whenever an extension is installed. (This replaces the csh_* extensions that were used to install core translations before TYPO3 version 4!)

trans-unit.target: (Notice: You may need to clear the cache after the configuration of the extension. This is required if the extension adds TypoScript depending on these settings.)

trans-unit.source: The extension has an extension key prefixed with "user_" which indicates that it is a user-defined extension with no official unique identification. Therefore it cannot be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: The extension has an extension key prefixed with "user_" which indicates that it is a user-defined extension with no official unique identification. Therefore it cannot be uploaded.

trans-unit.source: You have not configured a default username/password yet. %sGo to "Settings"%s if you want to do that.
trans-unit.target: You have not configured a default username/password yet. %sGo to "Settings"%s if you want to do that.

trans-unit.source: Dumping table content for static tables:
trans-unit.target: Dumping table content for static tables:

trans-unit.source: Write current static table contents to ext_tables_static+adt.sql now!
trans-unit.target: Write current static table contents to ext_tables_static+adt.sql now!

trans-unit.source: Write this dump to ext_tables.sql now!
trans-unit.target: Write this dump to ext_tables.sql now!

trans-unit.source: This dump is based on two factors:
trans-unit.target: This dump is based on two factors:

trans-unit.source: 1) All table names in ext_tables.sql which are not found in the "modify_tables" list in ext_emconf.php are dumped with the current database structure.
trans-unit.target: 1) All table names in ext_tables.sql which are not found in the "modify_tables" list in ext_emconf.php are dumped with the current database structure.

trans-unit.source: 2) For any table names which are listed in "modify_tables" all fields and keys found for the table in ext_tables.sql will be redumped with the fresh equivalents from the database.
trans-unit.target: 2) For any table names which are listed in "modify_tables" all fields and keys found for the table in ext_tables.sql will be redumped with the fresh equivalents from the database.

trans-unit.source: Bottomline is: Whole tables are dumped from database with no regard to which fields and keys are defined in ext_tables.sql. But for tables which are only modified, any NEW fields added to the database must in some form or the other exist in the ext_tables.sql file as well.
trans-unit.target: Bottomline is: Whole tables are dumped from database with no regard to which fields and keys are defined in ext_tables.sql. But for tables which are only modified, any NEW fields added to the database must in some form or the other exist in the ext_tables.sql file as well.

trans-unit.target: This extension is currently installed (loaded and active) and cannot be deleted!

trans-unit.source: Extension "{0}" was uploaded to the TER.
trans-unit.target: Extension "{0}" was uploaded to the TER.

trans-unit.source: This may take some time, please wait...
trans-unit.target: This may take some time, please wait...

trans-unit.source: The key must not begin with one of the following prefixes: tx,u,user_,pages,tt_,sys_,ts_language_,csh_
trans-unit.target: The key must not begin with one of the following prefixes: tx,u,user_,pages,tt_,sys_,ts_language_,csh_

trans-unit.source: Extension keys cannot start or end with 0-9 or '_' (underscore)
trans-unit.target: Extension keys cannot start or end with 0-9 or '_' (underscore)

trans-unit.source: An extension key must have a minimum 3 characters and a maximum of 30 characters (not counting underscores)
trans-unit.target: An extension key must have a minimum 3 characters and a maximum of 30 characters (not counting underscores)

trans-unit.source: Transfer an extension key to another user. There is no undo so be sure you have the right username of the person you want to transfer the extension key to.
trans-unit.target: Transfer an extension key to another user. There is no undo so be sure you have the right username of the person you want to transfer the extension key to.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an extension key. There is no undo. Once a key is deleted, it is available again for registration.
trans-unit.target: Deletes an extension key. There is no undo. Once a key is deleted, it is available again for registration.

trans-unit.source: Transfer of extension key {0} to user {1} succeded.
trans-unit.target: Transfer of extension key {0} to user {1} succeded.

trans-unit.source: Transfer of extension key {0} to user {1} failed.
trans-unit.target: Transfer of extension key {0} to user {1} failed.

trans-unit.source: Attempt to delete extension key {0} failed.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to delete extension key {0} failed.

trans-unit.source: Integrity of TYPO3 main repository record
trans-unit.target: Integrity of TYPO3 main repository record

trans-unit.source: Last update of TYPO3 main repository
trans-unit.target: Last update of TYPO3 main repository

trans-unit.source: The following extensions are insecure and usage might damage your system. Please update these extensions as soon as possible or remove them from your system:
trans-unit.target: The following extensions are insecure and usage might damage your system. Please update these extensions as soon as possible or remove them from your system:

trans-unit.source: The following extensions were found on your system, but are currently not installed. Please delete the extensions using the extension manager:
trans-unit.target: The following extensions were found on your system, but are currently not installed. Please delete the extensions using the extension manager:

trans-unit.source: This extension is marked as insecure and usage might damage your system. Please update this extension as soon as possible or remove it from your system.
trans-unit.target: This extension is marked as insecure and usage might damage your system. Please update this extension as soon as possible or remove it from your system.

trans-unit.source: The table "sys_ter" was not found. Please go to the Install Tool and do a database compare!
trans-unit.target: The table "sys_ter" was not found. Please go to the Install Tool and do a database compare!

trans-unit.source: The Main Repository entry in table "sys_ter" was not found. Please go to the Extension Manager and import static data!
trans-unit.target: The Main Repository entry in table "sys_ter" was not found. Please go to the Extension Manager and import static data!

trans-unit.source: The Main Repository has no extensions. Please update the repository in the Extension Manager or the Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: The Main Repository has no extensions. Please update the repository in the Extension Manager or the Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: The Main Repository extension list is older than 7 days. Please update it in the Extension manager or Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: The Main Repository extension list is older than 7 days. Please update it in the Extension manager or Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: Extension list is not up to date!
trans-unit.target: Extension list is not up to date!

trans-unit.source: Enter something to search for. Title and extension key are used for search.
trans-unit.target: Enter something to search for. Title and extension key are used for search.

trans-unit.source: Enter something to search for and press Enter. For complete extension list use "*"
trans-unit.target: Enter something to search for and press Enter. For complete extension list use "*"

trans-unit.source: Click on a file to load in editor
trans-unit.target: Click on a file to load in editor

trans-unit.source: Show old modules: Enable this option to have old modules like "Loaded Extensions, Installed extensions ..." available in upper left select box of the Extension Manager
trans-unit.target: Show old modules: Enable this option to have old modules like "Loaded Extensions, Installed extensions ..." available in upper left select box of the Extension Manager

trans-unit.source: Language selection: The language setting is saved here as a global setting. You should not change it at this place but instead use the Extension Manager tab for "Translation handling" to add and remove languages for your installation
trans-unit.target: Language selection: The language setting is saved here as a global setting. You should not change it at this place but instead use the Extension Manager tab for "Translation handling" to add and remove languages for your installation

trans-unit.source: Use windows instead of inline display: On small screens the inline display of rows might take too much space. This switch moves the inline info to windows.
trans-unit.target: Use windows instead of inline display: On small screens the inline display of rows might take too much space. This switch moves the inline info to windows.

trans-unit.source: Display "My Extensions" Tab: In this tab you can manage your own extensions.
trans-unit.target: Display "My Extensions" Tab: In this tab you can manage your own extensions.

trans-unit.target: Do you want to save this file before loading another file?
